name: Labyrinth Escape (itch) (SkyeKnight42)
description:
Labyrinth Escape procedural maze game with a survival and horror aspects. Run and hide from ghosts as you collect potions to open the escape portal, collect oil bottles to keep your torch alight and try to complete the increasing difficulty as rounds progress is a prototype

Ghosts: They search the map, campfire to campfire looking for you, if they see you they will chase after you. However, looking at them will freeze their movement. End up with too many ghosts surrounding you and you may not escape alive.

This product is part of a university assignment for Anglia Ruskin University and is a free product with no planned future additions and alterations being made to the prototype product.
